image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Colorado; born in Lafayette, Boulder County, Colo., September 22, 1948; B.S., University of Colorado, 1970; farmer; business owner; chair, Republican State Central Committee of Colorado, 1999-2002; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighth and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2003-January 3, 2007); was not a candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Tenth Congress in 2006, but was an unsuccessful candidate for Governor of Colorado; unsuccessful candidate for Governor of Colorado in 2014.

creativeWork.freeFormCitationText: Beauprez, Bob. A Return to Values: A Conservative Looks at his Party. Golden, Colo.: Fulcrum Pub., 2009.
